name: Five Nights at Monstrum
description:
Welcome to Five Nights at Monstrum. Quik some readable Notes:

1. You will have to make a new Passwort for every Save.

2. And Click on the Game once and the press G (for getting back to Main Menu after Saving).

3. The Game could have some Bugs.

Its one of my first Games so Bugs are pretty much not unavoidable. But let me now in the Comments, so i can try fixing them. Have Fun!
